name: Freedom at any price? Downloadable
description:
Travel back in time to 1863. As a black slave on a Virginia plantation, you have a life-and-death decision to make. Do you want to try to escape and join the Union Army when it marches past next week? Or do you want to stay on the plantation with your family?

No matter what you choose, this is a very dangerous time. The people who make it out alive...win!

Curious about this topic? For more information go to: http://timetravelfieldtrips.com/freedom-at-any-pri...
